summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BodyArchitect AI app. Authentication, navigation, and UI components work well, but core photo upload/AI analysis feature is broken due to backend API issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization and image processing issues
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks core AI body analysis feature - users cannot upload photos for analysis
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: [TypeError("'ObjectId' object is not iterable"), TypeError('vars() argument must have __dict__ attribute')] and image processing errors

integration_issues.issue: Will fail due to backend API returning 520 error

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct hero content
Navigation between all pages (landing, auth, dashboard, progress)
Dashboard displays user info and stats correctly
Progress page shows appropriate no-data state
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix photo upload API (/api/analysis/upload) - resolve MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue and image processing errors. The core AI body analysis feature is completely broken, preventing users from uploading photos for analysis.

success_percentage.backend: 78% (7/9 tests passed - auth and data APIs work, photo upload fails)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all UI/navigation works, photo upload will fail due to backend)
